1133222.content:
Your fears are confirmed nearly immediately when you recognize the slope under you and begin your descent. Your sister's throat closes around you are you're compacted against its walls then forcefully sent downward, where you and the remaining milk and saliva are sucked down into the esophagus with one wet, resounding gulp.

Your body is pressed into the tight, constricting tube of her esophagus. The sticky feeling of the residual cereal mush against your skin revulses you as you are finally forced through the sphincter into the tight, wrinkled pit of her stomach. Although it is only the size of her hand to her, the stomach is like one endless chamber to you from your size.

All around you is the sound of her body, most prominently the persistent thud of her heartbeat, and closest to you, the gurgles and blorps of her belly, trying its hardest to break down and process all of the food put into it, including you.

Doing your best to stay afloat in the thick soup of chyme and bile, you try your best to move to a wall to beat at it for help. It proves pointless, as reaching the walls only causes you to be pulled into a fold along it where you're only beaten senseless by its convulsing muscles. Soon you are finally ejected back into the center of the stomach, where you float aimlessly.

From here there's only going to be one way out, and you didn't know if you would be alive at the end of it.
1133222.title: Connection

11332221.content:
Even as you try your hardest to thrash around to get your enormous sister to notice you, there's nothing you can do. Eventually the walls begin to contract and convulse violently, pulling you under the slop and then churning you as intently as possible. As the acid around you finally begins to pierce your skin, you scream out to your sister, but recieve no response. Above you she now is lying in her bed, on her phone reading Instagram, unable to hear your cries over the monumental groans and rumbles her stomach emits as you are processed.

Soon your body is dissolved and mixed in with the soup of her stomach, now an unrecognizable mix of cereal, bile and you. The chamber of her stomach begins progressively emptying its contents into the intestines where all of the nutrition you provided will be absorbed into her body.

Your sister lets out small burp, expelling your final breaths and, in essence, your existence into the air of her bedroom. She's completely unaware that you are now a mess of slop spread through her intestines awaiting to be taken into her body.

Within a couple of hours, nothing of you is left other than the small amount of energy given to your sister--your only mark on the world. All in all, you end up as an irrelevant morsel that barely tided the immense appetite of your older sister's mature body.

I have a lot of questions for Natasha) , you get a glimpse of your step mother rushing through the kitchen, causing your sister to push herself more into the kitchen table.

Your sister pushed the table a little bit to hard to cause the cereal/milk and you to spill over the bowl.

Your heart is pounding, coughing out the excess milk that you swallowed.

Mother: I’m sorry Christa, I’m running late for work— I slept in.

Christa: Oh it’s fine, are you... hey that’s my cereal!

Mother: Sorry hun, theres $10 on the kitchen counter. Use that to buy yourself something to eat.

Your step mother gulps down the milk/cereal aggressively, you run over yelling trying to get her attention that Natasha is in the cereal. Your step mother finished and you fell onto your knees in disbelief

You: NOOOOO! I was to late, she’s gone...

You start waving both hands and it catches Natasha attention. She yells and you cannot hear or make out the words she’s saying. Natasha points towards a direction from where your step mother first appeared into the kitchen. Just as Natasha was trying to communicate with you...

Step mother: Oh goodness, there’s a piece of cereal still on the edge of my lips.

Natasha eyes widened, tears poured .. Natasha desperately trying to escape—your step mother tongue comes from under Natasha and you see Natasha very briefly before she was completely gone within your step mother mouth.

Your step mother gulps and you can make out your friend figure inside your step mother throat before she completely vanishes behind her breast.
Your step mother burps and a shoe is all that flew out of her mouth

You: She’s.. she’s gone.. you looked at the shoe and inside the shoe was full of slobber.. you were shocked and you felt like a deer frozen watching a pair of high beam headlight heading towards you.. your body didn’t allow you to move. As you didn’t move your step mother excuses herself and she headed out the door towards the car.

You’re still shaken and felt sick of the possibilities that Natasha has to go through but you gave yourself a good shake and remembered Natasha was pointing towards the entrance your mother first appeared into the kitchen.

My Step mother doesn’t work long today for the school because it was labour day today. Hopefully she won’t be too long and there might be a chance to still save your friend.

You: Natasha was pointing towards a direction for me to go through and it looks like I have to go to where my step mother first appeared.

I have a choice I can either climb my way down from the table or hitch hike into my sister leading me close to where I need to go

1221.content:
You have no idea how you ended in your friend Erika's house, but getting out of her cereal bowl takes priority over solving that mystery. The chill of the milk seeps deeper into your skin, and numbness begins to overtake your body. The spoon dives back towards the bowl and creates tidal waves that nearly drown you. As it is, you know your preteen body won't last more than a few minutes under it's current conditions, and you can only get so lucky with Erika's aim.

Swimming towards the edge of the bowl, you realise the milk is too low for you to make an attempt to climb up the sides. A big enough tidal wave of milk might give you enough of a boost to escape. Of course, you could hitch a ride on Erika's spoon, and with a bit of luck you could jump to safety. Or, if you feel really risky, you could wait and see if she drinks the milk once the cereal is gone, and use the tilt of the bowl and her soft face to escape. That's assuming you can remain conscious that long.

12212.content:
Deciding that waiting around isn't going to help you, you swim towards a piece of cereal floating on the milk's surface and wait. Sure enough, Erika's spoon comes down once again and goes right under your floatation device.

The spoon is deeper than you thought it would be, and your feet don't even reach the bottom as you slide off the cereal chunk. Luckily, the edge of the spoon is only a few strokes away, and you reach the metal rim in time. Fear fills your body as you look up and see Erika's mouth already upon you. With no time to jump, you accept your fate, and plunge into her mouth with the rest of the spoon. Milk spills out of the spoon before your friend pulls it out of her mouth, with you no longer on it. You feel yourself falling deeper into the hot, humid cavern of her mouth, but feel your hand brush by something.
12212.title: Scramble to the spoon

choices: Wait an see what happens (Non digestion)
122121.content:
A strand of saliva brushes by your palm, which does little for you besides getting your hand all sticky with your friend's spit. Erika's tongue begins to raise to the roof of her mouth, and you are pulled down by chunks of cereal and the binding mix of milk and saliva that holds them. Coated in the sweet smell of milk and sugary cereal, you are helpless against the force of your preteen friend's swallowing. The contents are forced back to the throat and, despite your desperate clawing and scrambling, you make no progress up the massive surface of Erika's tongue.

Your outstretched arms are the last of you to pass into the cramped vertical passage of Erika's throat. She gulps loudly, giving enough push to down her great mouthful. You are pulled down rhythmically through her throat along with cereal mush and milk. A constant reoccuring vibration echoes loudly throughout; it is the beating of Erika's heart. Her mouthful of breakfast is now starting to trouble you, as you have to hold your breath since the most of the milk is steadily trickling down faster than you are moving. Before long, luckily (I guess you could say that), you and the preteen girl's food are forced into a dark, smelly humid cavern echoing with weird gurgly and blorpy noises.

This is Erika's stomach. You know from experience that whatever ends up in your thin growing friend is utterly doomed. Now, that "whatever" happens to be you.
122121.title: Swallowed by Erika

1221211.content:
What's the point of fighting the inevitable? You walk around a bit in the knee-high mush of Erika's chewed-up breakfast, looking for a nice place to sit down and contemplate death. Another mouthful of cereal and milk pours in, splashing all up on you as it hits the bottom. Erika's stomach shakes with a big groan, prompting her to finish the cereal. Finally sitting, you watch with a...comforting nonchalance as a huge amount of food falls into her belly. You are absolutely covered in the stuff, but at this point you laugh it off, going crazy in your situation.

Perhaps you could have gotten her attention. Too late now, it's hard to even move with all this extra weight, and you're also caught between the now chest-high pool of mush since you're sitting. You can smell the sweet sugary aroma get overwhelmed by the acidic stench of Erika's stomach acid. Slowly but steadily, a burning sensation creeps up on you, just as a flowing waterfall of milk rushes in. Erika has just slurped her bowl dry. The combination of these effects cools the burning a little, but now you are pretty much swimming in milk. Super-cold milk really. The shock drains your energy, as the preteen's tummy emits a satisfied rumbling. The last you see before you pass out are air bubbles rising up from the milky surface. Milk always did make Erika have to burp, you recall.

As expected, Erika finishes off her breakfast with a resounding milky belch. The 12-year-old giggles as all of her friends laugh at her loud burp. They are having breakfast after a sleepover the previous night. She exhales, lifts up her shirt and pats her soft, flat yet full tummy, furthering the laughs and giggling.

If you were conscious, you probably would have laughed too. But you're not. In fact, you've already started digesting. Soon, you'll be nothing more than extra energy for Erika. A few hours later she will be hungry again and there will be nothing recognizable left of you inside of her belly. Not even your clothes.
1221211.title: She's got a friend in...her

choices: You're not a very good swimmer (wait)
1221212.content:
In the lake of digesting cereal and milk, you wade through it all to make it to the walls of Erika's stomach. You hear another mouthful drop in behind you, followed by the shaking of the preteen's belly, an eager groan to welcome the new pile of chewed-up food. You start to punch at the walls of her stomach, and jump around while doing so, hoping that you'll irritate her enough just to get some kind of attention.

"Oww, my tummy hurts now..." Erika places a hand to her aching belly. It is starting to get full, just in time as the cereal bowl is now only holding milk. "Milk always helps my stomach settle, I think..." She starts to gulp down the milk in her bowl.

You're efforts are stopped as you are washed away by the ocean of milk that pours into Erika's stomach. Once she is finished, she wipes her mouth and sighs, "Ahh...better."

The settled milk starts to bubble up around you. You see (and feel) some whoosh up out of her tummy. Then, as expected, you hear Erika let out a big burp.

"Ha ha, that felt good." Erika comments gleefully. A few of the other girls look at her in awe. That was an impressive belch. She rubs her soft belly, and lets out a second burp, this time quietly.

Maybe you can ride with the milk bubbles?
1221212.title: Try to escape Erika's tummy

Though coated in saliva, you are able to grab the strand of red hair and keep from going any further into Erika's mouth. In an even greater stroke of luck, you feel yourself actually being pulled out of your friend's mouth as she removes the stray hair. Her lips part just enough for your tiny body to slide out with the hair, flooding your vision with light. Still coated in a milky white saliva thanks to the milk. you begin to slide down the strand of hair. You body slides along Erika's shoulder, then her chest before the hair ends. With nothing beneath you, you go into free fall and head straight for Erika's lap.You land with a soft thud, as Erika's flannel pajamas absorb most of your impact.

After climbing Erika's top and jumping back onto the table, you're able to look around at the girls all eating breakfast.

First, of course, is Erika, the giant girl in front of you. She has straight red hair that goes just beyond her shoulders, and sun-kissed skin that does a good job hiding her freckles as a tan. You approach the twins, as they chew up their latest mouthfuls of pancakes. The girls just as quickly swallow their bites, and you watch as lumps of mashed-up food make the journey into two preteen girls' stomachs. What horrible places to end up.

Distracted, you accidentally bump into the plate that the twins are sharing off of, and fall flat on your face into syrup. Oh no! You scramble to get up, but that only loosens you up a little, and the rest of you slides with the contour of the plate towards the center, right into the flapjack stack.

Just as you feel yourself getting away, one of the girls sticks her fork right into the section of pancake that you're stuck to. You're hoisted into the hair, and simultaneously pushed back into the syrupy stickiness as a result.

You can only watch in horror as the mouth of a 12-year-old girl opens up right in front of you. The gigantic cavern is glistening and dripping with saliva, and her breath is almost unbearably sweet, coming at you in hot, humid breezes.

Against your will, you are shoved inside. The girl's chewing finally breaks you from the pancakes, although she nearly chomped down on you in the process. You are tossed around her mouth, coated in sticky saliva and all the while just petrified. How could you even scream? You don't want to get pre-chewed pancakes all in your mouth. After about ten rough seconds of chewing, the girl's tongue pushes everything to the back of her throat, and then she gulps it all down. You notice that she doesn't chew her food very well, as there are some pretty big chunks just being swallowed like nothing.

Squishing everything together covers you in syrupy pancake mush, making it nice and easily for you to eventually slide out into her stomach. The floor of this rumbling digestive cavern is coated with the very same mush. Various disgusting and frankly terrifying noises are echoing around you, as her stomach gurgles and churns, beginning the transformation of her breakfast into energy. You can barely breathe in the low-oxygen humid air, not to mention that it's a god-awful combination of a super-sweet syrup smell and stomach acid.

Oh, by the way, which twin ate you?

Suddenly, you hear a gulp, and dash out of the way of the stomach sphincter before a big pile of chewed-up pancakes enters. May's stomach is now beginning to expand, becoming legitimately full.

May, patting her slightly distended belly, lets out a quieter burp, blowing the air across the table. Most of the girls are finishing up and are letting out burps of their own. May quickly shoves the last huge portion of pancake into her mouth, while June is still working on her last mouthful.

"I win!" May says, delighted and in an extremely muffled voice due to her full mouth. Within a half a minute, those pancakes are gone, nothing left except for a syrupy sticky plate.

May can't hear your pain over the satisfying noises and rumblings of the very death chamber you are inside of. Instead, she giggles and lifts up her pajama shirt. Her belly is definitely stretched from its usually flat appearance, packed full of breakfast. Whatever air can escape does, resulting in more loud and sweet burps. All of the girls are finished now, and the area around the table is filled with the low growling of several full tummies. Two of the other girls start having a burping contest together, and the one who ate her breakfast faster won, as she ended up swallowing more air. They all took turns feeling each others' stomachs, enjoying the unique feeling of how each was packed and how brutally its contents were being digested.

Meanwhile, your body is unrecognizable, insignificantly added to the great mass of food boiling in May's stomach. You might give the young teen some extra protein throughout the day, or help her grow another inch tomorrow, but as for your existence outside of her, it is gone, unless you count her burping as what's left of you.

Plan to leave when she goes to sleep later

Outside of the boiling chamber melting the mushy remains of six pancakes, June's visible bloated belly is enjoying a good round of pats and rubs from May, as the two twins are greatly amused by its digestive noises.

*grrrrn* *BLOOORP* *guuuUUUUURGLE* *pop* *slllurk*

"Hey, I think I felt, like, a kick or something!" May giggles as she feels a light tapping on her hand from within June's tummy (that would be you, by the way.)

"Maybe the pancakes are trying to escape!" June laughs, then proudly opens her mouth wide, *BBBRAAAAAAOOOOOOORP* *uuuuuuRRRRRP* "Ahh...can't blame them!" The two sisters continue in their amused bliss amidst the sweet syrupy stench of June's latest burps.

By now, you should have been dead, judging by the state of the pancakes you entered with...but somehow, you're alive, soooo...I guess this means you can't be digested. However, it's not like you're leaving anytime soon, if the oblivious nature of the girls wasn't painfully obvious. What to do?

Slowly, but surely, your back separates from the viscicous syrup. With a smile on your face, you get to yank your legs free as well and run quickly from the plate. Just in the nick of time too, as May's fork stabbed in the part of the pancake that you were just on. You shouldn't delve into that though too much, because the golden-haired girl's sister took a notice to you.

"Oh my goodness! You've shrunk!" June shouted, garnering the attention of the other girls at the table.

"Ow!" You yelled, clamping your ears in pain after hearing her.

"What are you talking about, June?" Erika said, walking up her along with everyone else.

June gestured to you with a pointed index finger on her left hand. You wave meekly as everyone (sans Sylvia) gave a collective gasp.

"How did this happen?"

You shrugged, still unable to figure this out.

"I don't know. All I remember is waking up in Erika's cereal bowl. I escaped by climbing on her hair just before she dumped me into her mouth." You explained.

Erika gained a look of remorse on her face. Sure it was an accident, but the fact that she nearly ate one of her friends was still disturbing.

"Then, I tried to get June or May to notice me but I got trapped in the syrup. I barely escaped before May stuck her fork in the place that I just was." You concluded.

May gulped nervously.

"Sorry about that." She said with a blush.

“It’s fine. Anyone could’ve made that mistake.”

“So how do we get you back to normal?” June asked.

All of you shrugged, being just as clueless as the other… except for Sylvia strangely.

“Well, in the meantime, we should put you some where safe. Where do you want to go?” Kathrine asked.

You think about it for a moment and decide to go to…
12212222212.title: ...And it looks like you're going to be free

You walk cautiously across the table and see two familiar faces. First is Kathrine, a new girl who showed up last year. She was always with Erika and you thought she might have a slight crush on you. Her long brown hair is tied back into a ponytail. Her blue eyes focused on her food, not really paying attention to the others around you. She could probably be your best bet.

Or.. you could go to Sylvia .. that girl seemed to hate your guts. For no specific reason. Every time she saw a guy she would always get into a fight with them. You as well as the rest of the guys at your school do your best to try and avoid her extreme feministic beliefs. Maybe she'd help?

Who to go to?...
1221222222.title: Kathrine and Sylvia

12212222222.content:
You, for some reason, decided to seek the help of Sylvia. This cute, skinny pre-teen with silky dark, almost black, hair and light blue eyes, looked like the sweetest girl you could ever meet. She wasn't. Why did you even pick her? Do you want to die or something?

Carefully, you walk over to her plate. She still has quite a bit of pancakes left to eat, and appears to be chewing some up right now. Do you want to get her attention right this moment, or do you have a plan in mind?
12212222222.title: Sylvia

122122222221.content:
With the "fuck it" adjustment clearly in mind, you climb onto her plate and start moving around, making sure to get in her line of sight. Sylvia notices you in no time, but does not say a word, since her mouth is full. She doesn't seem surprised or worried or shocked or...anything. Almost like, she's wondered about and waited for something like this for a long time...

"Hey! Sylvia!" You shout, but of course, you're kinda small so the sound doesn't carry well. She smiles down at you, as you notice a lump travel down her throat; it's her freshly-crushed mouthful. Sylvia has a mischevious look about her.

"Finally," Sylvia thinks to herself, "Boys think that girls are soooo delicate and powerless...we'll see about that after I eat you and my stomach kills you, little guy."

You're getting nervous about the silence. Suddenly, the girl's fork comes down very forcefully, missing you by a little more than an inch! Right then, you realize what's really going on.

"I gotta get out of here! Why would Sylvia help me? I'm soo stupid!" You go to jump, but syrup keeps your legs bound to the piece of sweet breakfast pastry...

Sylvia lets out an evil little giggle as she innocently eyes her next forkful. Her stomach groans a bit, so she takes the opportunity and puts her hand on it, almost rubbing it. You see this, and are met with that innocent smirk. She's toying with you without catching the attention of her friends.

Then, the dreaded darkness opens up. Sylvia opens her mouth wide, and slides the fork in. As she pulls the pancake off of the utensil, you are shut in pitch blackness, save for the faint glow from light outside bouncing off of her skin. Once she removes the fork, trapping you completely in her maw, her tongue starts swishing you around, throwing you into the glistening walls of her mouth, grazing you with her teeth, and drenching you in sticky, warm saliva.

"Mmm," She revels in her thoughts, "Who knew boys tasted this good?" Her stomach rumbles again. "I guess I should send him to die now."

You consider it merciful that, as she chews up the pancakes, you are avoiding her teeth. But that all changes after you are forcefully pushed down her throat with the thick, viscous mush. You are headed for her stomach. A pre-teen girl's belly, hungry for breakfast. A guaranteed death trap.

With an unsettling, slurpy sound, you are sent through a sphincter, and then take a short tumble into Sylvia's tummy. Her stomach makes these disgusting gurgling sounds as you find your footing. Due to your small size, the vibrations from these rumbles shake you around immensly, almost off your feet each time. The faint glow, just like before, helps you find your way around. You begin to see the mounds of chewed-up pancakes, mixed with gooey syrup, gathering in the center of her stomach in one, big, boiling pile. As such, you stay near the walls and corners. Stomach acid combines with the sweet sugars, creating a loud round of digestion, and an awful smell.

Outside, Sylvia hears her stomach welcome you. She actually speaks this line, instead of thinking it to herself, "I hope you burn away slowly," before giggling innocently again.

As her stomach starts to fill up with pancakes, it begins to churn the stuff to make room. Now, you are sent into a frantic run to avoid this digesting mound of food as it tries to collide with you. If you are caught in that...urgh, it hurts to think about.

Sylvia takes a big gulp of milk, which only helps your situation, of course!! Not. The milk flows in and prevents you from running. Good thing you're a decent swimmer. The combination of air pockets being released as part of the pancakes' digestion, and the introduction of bubbly milk create a thick mass of humid, foul air that fills the preteen's tummy.

"Oww..." Sylvia moans as her stomach makes its own noises, "My stomach hurts...stupid boy. Probably is trying to save himself or something." With that, Sylvia lets out a rude loud burp. The scents of sugar, milk, and digestion are introduced as the girl's stomach air is expelled.

"I think my stomach is trying to tell him there's no escape." She giggles and smells her own burp, "Ew, sucks to be him." A tiny burp rushes up her throat and catches her by surprise.

Do you digest?

Before long, you are swept into the collecting digestive mass, and acid starts to hit you. Immediately, your clothes begin to burn away, and you scream in sheer pain as the feeling begins to pierce the outer layer of your skin. Your ride within the girl's belly coats you in the stuff, and seconds after you feel the worst pain in your entire life, you pass out.

Sylvia's stomach emits a low, powerful gurgle. She feels another burp coming up, and unleashes it just as the last. If the first burp signaled your inevitable doom, this expulsion of air from the young girl's tummy signals your death.

Tears stream down your face and drop into the milk below as you realise that this was your end. Your life had led to this moment. All of your hopes and dreams, the people you knew and affected, the worries you had were all for naught. Years of your life, you grew from a child into what you are now. It all essentially flashed before your eyes as you felt the metal of the spoon meet your feet. Bella brought up you and a couple of other pieces of cereal to her mouth without so much as a passing glance. Into her warm mouth, you went. Her lips sealed behind you and the spoon was retracted through them. You tried to come to terms with it, force a smile but you couldn't. There was no greater meaning to your life, it wasn't headed anywhere significant. Your last thought was one of sadness with a twinge of acceptance.

Bella crunched the cereal up between her teeth until it had been ground up into mush, then she gulped it down. This process repeated, with an occasional chuckle at her phone, until there wasn't any left in the bowl. She yawned, stretched, stood up and took her bowl and spoon to the sink, then continued about her day.

A villainous twinkle in his eye revealed the truth to you. He knew you were there, and had been trying to fool you for as long as he could. You floundered desperately, trying to get back above the surface, but then you felt the cold hard metal of the spoon hit against your back, rushing upwards and dragging you with it.

You burst from the milk, your naked body slick as the creamy liquid flowed off of you. You sat up in the spoon, cereal and milk splashing around you as Justin's face loomed in front of you. He laughed at you, his laugh seeming to echo around you as her lifted the spoon to his mouth. His tongue poked from his mouth, reaching forward and lapping gently at the spoon, the large, warm muscle brushing against you as his tongue teased you.

What did he plan to do with you?
13522.title: He sees you

135222.content:
"So, whatever happened to you, little one? It's not every day I end up with a tiny person in my breakfast." It was almost unexpected to hear Justin speak, his warm breath washing over you as you sat curled in the spoon. You tried to explain that you didn't know what or how, but your voice was too quiet for Justin to hear. He stared at you for a few moments, before a wicked grin spread across his face.

"You know, I have always wondered what another human would taste like, and now I've got one just waiting for me to try out!" Before you could protest, he opened his mouth wide, strings of saliva hanging like stalactites from the roof of his mouth as the black depths of his throat loomed beyond the two rows of huge pearly white teeth. His tongue filled the bottom of his mouth, drool running off it as he licked his lips. At the far back of his throat his uvula could be seen hanging, dangling above the void of his throat.

In an instant, the spoon was in his mouth, and the lips closed behind you, sealing you inside. The spoon slowly slid backward, the closed lips wiping all of the milk and cereal off it. You were pressed against the lips as the spoon was pulled from the mouth, trapping you inside Justin's maw. His tongue started running along his gums, licking around his teeth as he scooped the cereal in-between his teeth.

As you tried to stand up, the tongue moved, knocking you off your feet as it curled around you, almost crushing you before tossing you back and forth. You slammed painfully into one of his teeth before falling back onto his tongue. He was toying with you, and clearly enjoying it.

His warm breath almost blew you off your feet as you balanced on the slippery tongue once more. The two huge rows of teeth separated, lifting high above you, before slamming back down, crushing cereal in between the massive teeth. If you were to be there when that happened, you would die instantly, thats if you were lucky.

As you began to stand back up the tongue rolled backwards suddenly, and you began to slide down it. The black void of his throat loomed in front of you, eager to swallow you into the darkness. You tried to cling onto the tongue, but the slippery flesh offered no traction, the saliva slick as you scrambled for any sort of handhold.

You lost all grip and slipped, sliding along the wet tongue. The warm, moist throat seemed almost inviting as you rushed towards it, but your survival instincts kicked in. Looking around, you spotted the dangling uvula, possibly your only possible salvation that could stop your descent. The question was, would you take the risk and leap for it, or would you just enjoy the ride all the way down to the stomach?

Thankfully for you, your jump was good enough, and you hit into the uvula with a splat. You started to slip down, and you scrambled to grip onto the flesh as your legs dangled above the void.

You miraculously managed to hold on before you completely fell, and you watched in both amazement and horror as Justin swallowed, sending the cereal and milk swirling down his throat, the milk splashing against your legs as you watched it all drain away, on a one way trip down to his stomach. "Ah, thanks for the meal, whoever you were. Shame you were so small, I didn't get to taste you for very long. Whatever, I've got stuff to do, digest quickly would you?"

He appeared to have not realised that you were still in the mouth, so it was up to you what happened next. The throat still loomed below you, dark but inviting. You could try to climb up and out through his nose, but it would be a dangerous climb. Then again, the only other option seemed to be to dive down the moist throat and take your chances in his stomach or lungs.

choices: She spills some milk on her lap - with you included!
You realize you're not the only person in the bowl!
143.content:
When you stared up to the sky, the sky stared back at you. A pair of soft, coconut-tinted eyes swallowed the world above. You keep frozen to the gram, basking in the shadow the face above cast onto the ocean-like bowl. Above, the milky microcosm reflected in her deep pupils, their globular shape rendering your current habitat into a raging sea - and you as a helpless dot too small to be seen.

Suddenly, the bowl began rocking. You wrapped your arms around a wide pillar - one of the many that formed the cereal gram's criss-crossing shape, your own gram one of dozens plunged into this unfamiliar woman's cereal. Her fingertips grasped hold of the horizon. Each mountainous ridge that made up her fingertips sunk down slowly while she grabbed it. More waves overtook nearby islands when she lifted the bowl up. After a few thundering footsteps, she placed it down, giving your island one final sway.

Just by carrying the bowl, this woman had permanently rehaped your landscape. You did NOT want to see what happened when her meal started. You ran, hoping that some solution might present itself. A world away, you saw the Japanese woman had moved further away. A sky-blue casual kimono robe covered her body.

You couldn't help but reel back in horror as she opened her mouth, a black hole lined with rows of glistening, pearly teeth. It let out a deafening roar, causing the milk to tremble slightly...

"Hwaaa~" Takayama Reiko yawned, lifting her index and middle finger to her open lips before moving the fingers to her temples. Memories of last evening's meal lingered like a fog over her loosely-haning hair. Her arms came close to touching the humble room's low ceiling as she stretched them up. Even with the electric fan whirring, the air found a way to remain stagnant, warm, and dry. From her knotted hair to her squarish legs, she could feel it setting in over every inch of her body; late Sunday morning lethargy. She let her sleepwear drift as she sluggishly picked up a nice, big cup of bancha tea.

Your heart kept racing, head screaming to move faster; but no matter how hard your legs ached, you weren't making any progress whatsoever. You could feel your feet crashing against the hard, grainy surface below, barely leaving a dent in it. In fact, it took fancy footwork to avoid tripping into a hole made by crossing lines of fiber-filled food. The girl's fingers wrapped around a glass, one hand underneath its base, another effortlessly covering its mountainous height. You could see the small ridges that separated each phalanx with awe-inspiring clarity, every one of them shifting slowly while she raised the beverage up to her mouth.

The sound of waves became louder - slowly turning into a downpour, then a booming waterfall-like noise. Droplets of tea sunk into one another, entangling into rivers; rivers becoming lakes; lakes flooding down onto the woman's outstretched tongue. They crashed into the taste buds, irrigating them like a field - an active, wriggling field full of life and energy. You nearly fell off your feet when an audible gulp squirmed from the depths of her throat. And yet, more came in. Even when it seemed like the distant woman's thirst would die out, she let more and more liquid fill the expanse of her mouth, warming her pale cheeks into a rose tint. And, with only a pause, and just as effortlessly as the faraway mountain of a person moved the monolithic cup, she swallowed. When her lips parted again, there was nothing left but teeth, and the shifting valleys of muscle and flesh. Now, a swooshing, like a sonic boom crashing above your head.

Her hands sifted through her fine hairs. Reiko put down the teacup, letting the flavor linger in the back of her mouth; the warmth spread over the length of her throat. The sides of her mouth couldn't help but lift up in a slow smile, pushing against the side of her cheek. She looked over the kitchen wall's pattern, as if the tiles had some sort of meaning. When she picked up the sugar spoon, her hands fumbled with it slightly, still shaken by the Japanese Sandman's grasp. Drawing out an irritated "tch", she sprinkled her cereal with the white cubes.

It was like watching a meteor shower - except the sun was blocked by the curve of a mighty spoon, and there was no stratosphere to protect you from their descent. Every featureless square crashed into the cereal, making splashes and ripples in each direction. They washed over your platform, sending it in a spiral-like motion. It brought you closer to the bowl's center. Soon, your movement was halted by the metal surface itself. Though it crashed a fair distance away, your heart nearly halted, too - lumps formed along the surface of your flesh. It was unbelievable. This - this great monolith, this undented, unmovable wall of steel... This was a spoon. The kind that people ate food with.

The stranger picked up the bowl again - sending you rocking back and forth upon its sweeping waves. With a slow, large sigh, her morning breath engrossed you - and blew your gram a considerable distance. But even worse was the steady thunder from her steps below; at once an impossibly distant sound, and a reminder of your helplessness that shook you to your core. You shut your eyes and held on, prepared for the worst...

Finally, it stopped. The storm calmed, and the sound of footsteps was replaced with a low buzzing. You forced your eyelips up, and saw the blue of a sky. Only... with the smooth texture of fabric. Her kimono! You gazed up, and saw her arm moving down for the spoon, the ridges in her fingers compressing and decompressing once more as they slipped around its handle. She had the cereal bowl in her lap. When you glanced behind you, there was an unbroken plain for miles in the distance - followed by a pair of slippers on a footrest, and a television between them. It seems this stranger was eating breakfast on the couch.

Reiko slid back into the cushion, wobbling gently until her back was firmly in place. Sunday morning - it was a time for her to relax, no matter what had happened yesterday. She twirled the spoon in an uneven circle around her bowl, before fishing in for a mouthful of the cereal.

As the woman's spoon lifted, it was like watching islands abducted into the sky. Waterfalls of milk poured from the edge, splashing down. Her neck bent in close, and she opened her mouth wide. From this position, you could almost hear her stomach gurgling with anticipation. Her pink lips slid apart with a curious tongue peeking out, before opening to their full width. The inside of her mouth was covered with moisture, wetness caking the muscles and teeth. It closed around the metal eagerly, before her neck pulled back, sucking it dry. Like that, the islands were gone - their only memory a wet chewing sound echoing in the distance. She expertly twirled the spoon around, eyes dimly reflecting the monitor. When her mouth opened again in a gentle yawn, you could see traces of the grams still stuck on one of her molars.

Reiko, eager for more of a weekend breakfast, dipped the spoon in again.
143.title: A japanese woman

choices: Try to climb up Reiko's throat
1431.content:
You continue to swim through the white lake in an effort to dodge the monolithic woman's spoon as it gathers pieces of cereal into her waiting mouth, to the point of no escape. Unfortunately, not much of the sugary stuff remains in the bowl. In her haste, Reiko dips her spoon into the bowl and scoops up your tiny form! She must've mistaken you for some kind of cereal piece with "special" qualities. How did the Japanese woman even manage that?!

You have no time to ponder this matter, as you and the spoonful are deposited in Reiko's dark, wet mouth, the spoon coming back out past her lips empty. The pearly-white teeth come down to masticate the cereal to bits (you thankfully not included), however, you are unable to delay the inevitable -- the giantess's tongue launches you into the lightless, abyssal throat of Reiko, and you are swallowed down whole with one quick...

*GULP!*

Reiko feels an odd tickle in her throat and coughs a few times, patting her chest with her free hand. She is utterly clueless that she'd eaten another person alive. To her, the tickle in her esophagus was merely a difficult bite of cereal.

After what feels to you like an eternity, you are squeezed through a tight sphincter before finally falling onto the spongy floor of Reiko's stomach. It doesn't smell very pleasant in this fleshy sac. The walls are pulsating, and a nearby greenish acid lake works to digest breakfast.

And, of course, you'll be next if you stick around in here much longer.

info.brief_description: You find yourself shrunken in someone's breakfast and you can't get out... or can you?
info.description:
You are shrunken in someone's cereal! Whether it be your brother or sister, mom or dad, friend or foe, model or movie star, they're hungry and don't even see you! Can you survive and get noticed before its too late?! You decide the story!

This story contains vore and vore related themes, if such themes and ideals make you uncomfortable please do not read.

This story is an unaware giantess/giant vore story, whether you digest or survive is up to the writer, however if you are going to add to the story, please attempt to use good grammar and if you plan on killing the story line, please release a set up to where the story may continue for the enjoyment of other readers. No short chapters and attempt to add vivid description of surroundings. ie. "The wet cavern in front of me loomed overhead. I stood in the spoon afraid that they would not notice me. A drop of saliva from the roof of her mouth dropped onto her undulating tongue, moving like a snake, awaiting its new meal. her teeth, dull but sharp could easily tear me in two and her throat... it loomed in the dark recesses of the cave, her uvula swinging there, waiting, her waiting throat, beckoning its meal forward." Sort of like that, appeal to the imagination and senses.
